fd03f64b41c3.title: Trump, like the witless Bush before him, has no idea what’s going on with our military’s…

paragraphs.text: Trump, like the witless Bush before him, has no idea what’s going on with our military’s adventurism overseas and he frankly doesn’t care. He told the military to do whatever they wanted to do and they dropped a bomb they’ve been wanting to use for the last 13 years.

e7066aa39b52.title: The question, “Did the president authorize the use of this bomb?”,

paragraphs.text: The question, “Did the president authorize the use of this bomb?”, was a stupid one. For all its destructive power, the MOAB is a conventional explosive bomb. It’s neither a nuclear device nor is it a chemical or biological weapon. In a war the president’s job as commander-in-chief is to outline the military’s overall goal and approve or disapprove…

paragraphs.text: The bigger the bomb the smaller the hands, you know what I mean. Now he wants to play the wartime president mantle so he can no longer be criticized. The real agenda is the tax breaks for the rich and how much he…
